page.title: 20NEWS & VIEWS-SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content:
CONTINUED FROM PAGE 20. {"There could be oil in them there {fields!"}It is reported that a British exploration company are seeking approval to drill for oil on the outskirts of Bognor Regis.The people we interviewed had mixed feelings about this proposal though many said they thought it was acceptable as long as the area was landscaped.
This information on SW.Bognor Regis was researched,collated and written by class J3 ,The Edward Bryant County Primary School,London Road,Bognor Regis.
